law.catch_line: Duty of partners to render information.
law.text: Partners shall render on demand true and full information on all things affecting the partnership to any partner or to the legal representative of any deceased partner or partner under legal disability.
law.history: Repeal the prior repeal contained in 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 149, sec. 239, which was to have been effective January 1, 2008, 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 137, sec. 180, effective June 26, 2007. -- Repealed 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 149, sec. 239, effective January 1, 2008. -- Amended 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 89, sec. 1, effective May 18, 1956. -- Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 38, sec. 20, effective June 17, 1954.
